about_the_game:
Welcome to Beach Boys!

This new and playful DLC brings a fresh and fun twist to enhance your game. Get ready to unlock a world of possibilities and elevate the experience like never before.

What will you find in this pack?

-New "Gallery" Mode: Discover a completely new way to view your characters. This mode lets you explore them in detail, from every expression to their unique styles.

-12 New Characters: Add a dozen unique personalities to your team, each with their own style and charm. Let them shine on the beach and bring out your boldest side with them!

Don’t wait any longer. Turn up the heat and enjoy Beach Boys like never before.
